tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
MY SELF SUNIL CHAUDHARY AGE 43 YRS. I VISITED FORTIS HOSPITAL IN EMERGENCY ON 13/09/2021, FOR COMPLAINT OF HEAVYNESS IN CHEST AND NAUSEA FEELING. AFTER INITIAL INVESTIGATION DONE BY EMERGENCY STAFF, THEY CAME TO CONCLUSION THAT I MIGHT TAKE VIEW OF CARDIOLOGIST. DR. PARNEESH ARORA CAME TO EMERGENCY TO INVESTIGATE MY REPORTS AND AFTER THOROUGH INVESTIGATION HE ADVISED ME WHAT ARE PROS AND CONS IN INVESTIGATION SO HE ADVISED ME FOR HOSPITALISATION IMMEDIATELY. ON RELYING HIS ADVISE I GOT ADMITTED AND GET DIAGNOSED FOR HEART DESEASE UNDER HIM. WHAT I LIKE ABOUT DR ARORA IS THOROUGH PROFESSIONALISM AND METICULOUS APPROACH TOWARDS MY TREATMENT. HE NOT ONLY GUIDED ME REGARDING MY TREATMENT AND ALSO GIVE BRIEF EXPLANATION REGARDING PROCEDURES FOR TREATMENT. I LIKE DR ARORA HIS TRANSPARENCY AND PROFESSIONAL APPROACH TOWARDS MY TREATMENT. I STRONGLY RECOMMEND Dr. PARNEESH ARORA FOR HEART DESEASE. ** ** ** ** *** **** ****** ** *********** I HUMBLY THANK DR ARORA FOR GIVING LIFE SAVING ADVISE AND SAVING MY LIFE. 
SUNIL CHAUDHARY
NOIDA
reply_text: Thank you . These words will motivate me to do even better.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Have been visiting Dr Parneesh arora for my father's artirial filbration and mother's BP/cardic treatment since years now* ** ** *** ** *** **** *********** ** **** Last year, he reviewed my mother's report, went through each detail and explained to us in clear way. I belonging to family of doctors, it is really hard to find doctor who goes extra mile in explaining the situation/disease. His empathy is great boon for patients and their families. Thank you sir. Himanshu Singh

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I belong to family of doctors and trust me, Dr Parneesh is a gem of a doctor . He patiently listen to problems and then explain in detail his line of diagnosis, treatment etc. I have been visiting him for my father's cardio treatment and father had many medical reports. He went through each one of them and then prescribed the treatment. ** ** ***** *** **** ****** *** * ** ********** **** * ******* ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
I had shown him echo,ecg,blood and urine reports and kidney ultrasound
I am 77 and have undergone three major operations and visited scores of doctors ,some hurried through reports and did not go beyond saying "satisfactory"Dr parneesh patiently browsed them and advised that many parameters which are normal can be further improved and explained how can all that be achieved..
He could have said "all satisfactory" and sent me off
reply_text: Thank you for the kind words .

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My mother and my brother are his patients.my experience with him is wonderful.he is a very good doctor.he listens to you carefully and explains each and every thing in detail.
The best part is he cares for the patient rather than concerned about the money.
I will recommend him .
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words.üôè

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: With Dr. No doubt very good experience but with hospital soon bad just two people are sitting in a reception takes  long time to deal with patient, they both were arguing with each other in front of 10 patients my appointment with Dr. Was 11.40am it took one hour to stand there the lady there was was bit rude I can understand her issue but really very bad experience  as I went all the way from Gurugram to patparganj. Just for this appointment .
**** **** ******. Understand the problem and is providing solutions.  Also makes you understand the issues properly.

reply_text: Thank you for your kind words .God bless .
